Facilities

Rooftop Swimming Pool

Located on the rooftop, with picture perfect ocean views, a great place to chill, sunbath and sip a cocktail while enjoying the spectacular Bali sunset. One large pool for adults of 1.4 meter depth and a children pool area of 0.5 meter depth, open daily from 7:00am to 7:00pm.

Operational Hours: 7:00 am - 7:00 pm
GuestPlates Canggu

GuestPlates Canggu – 24-Hour Café & Dining Near Batu Bolong Beach

Set in the warm, tropical-inspired lobby of Aston Canggu Beach Hotel, GuestPlates Canggu blends cozy café vibes with Canggu’s relaxed coastal energy. Featuring natural wood accents, open-air seating, comfortable lounge areas, and greenery throughout, it offers a welcoming space to enjoy good food at any hour.

Open 24 hours, GuestPlates is your go-to spot for breakfast, lunch, dinner, coffee, and late-night meals—just minutes from Batu Bolong Beach and Canggu’s popular café district.

Enjoy a variety of Indonesian favorites, international comfort food, and casual café-style dishes served in a relaxed setting suitable for solo diners, digital nomads, couples, and families. Freshly brewed coffee, iced café drinks, tropical juices, and refreshing beverages are available all day.

Whether you’re stopping by after the beach, taking a break from exploring Canggu, or looking for a comfortable alternative to the busy cafés along Batu Bolong, GuestPlates Canggu welcomes you with friendly service and flavors that feel like home.

Open 24 Hours Daily
Serving breakfast • lunch • dinner • snacks • drinks

 

 

Operational Hours: 24 Hours
Breakfast8am - 11.00am
Rooftop Dining & Bar – UpZscale Sky Dining & Bar

Rooftop Dining & Bar – UpZscale Sky Dining & Bar offers a seamless indoor and outdoor dining experience with sweeping ocean views of Batu Bolong Beach. Open daily from 7:00 AM to 11:00 PM for breakfast, lunch, and dinner, the venue is perfect for relaxed meals, sunset cocktails, and golden-hour moments overlooking Canggu’s coastline.

The indoor area features warm lighting, high wooden ceilings, and large ocean-facing windows, creating an elegant and comfortable atmosphere for casual dining or intimate gatherings. The open-air rooftop terrace offers panoramic 180° ocean views, gentle sea breezes, and front-row seats to Canggu’s iconic sunsets—ideal for al-fresco dining and unforgettable evening experiences.

With a total capacity of 120 guests, Rooftop Dining & Bar – UpZscale Sky Dining & Bar is also one of Canggu’s most sought-after venues for weddings and social events. The breathtaking sunset backdrop and flexible indoor–outdoor layout make it perfect for ceremonies, receptions, birthday celebrations, group dinners, and private parties. Our team provides personalized service and customizable menus to ensure every event is memorable.

Whether you're enjoying a calm morning breakfast, a breezy afternoon meal, or a sunset celebration under the open sky, UpZscale Sky Dining & Bar is your ocean-view destination for elevated dining and extraordinary moments in Canggu

 

Operational Hours: 7:00 am - 11:00 pm
Breakfast7:00 am - 10.30 am

Aston Canggu Beach Resort - A Lifestyle 4-Star Escape Just 1 Minute from Batu Bolong Beach 

Aston Canggu Beach Resort offers a stylish 4-star lifestyle experience just one minute walk from Batu Bolong Beach. Placing you at the heart of Canggu’s surf culture, vivid sunsets, and coastal energy, our prime location allows you to explore Bali’s most iconic attractions with ease while enjoying warm hospitality and contemporary comfort.

The resort features 93 chic rooms and one exclusive Aston Suite. Each space is designed with modern amenities and relaxed tropical touches—creating a calm, welcoming home whether you are here for a short getaway or an extended stay.

Indulge in local and international flavors at our lobby restaurant, GuestPlates, or elevate your evenings at our signature Rooftop Dining & Bar – UpZscale. Here, 180° panoramic views of the ocean and coastline set the perfect scene for golden-hour cocktails, romantic dinners, or relaxed gatherings under the stars.

Unwind at our ocean-facing rooftop pool, stay active in the gym, or step out to immerse yourself in the best of Canggu. Everything is within walking distance: from premium sunset spots like the iconic The Lawn and laid-back Times Beach Warung, to the boutique shops, popular cafés, yoga studios, and world-famous surf breaks of Batu Bolong.

Whether you’re visiting for surfing, wellness, nightlife, or a refreshing coastal escape, Aston Canggu Beach Resort is your perfect lifestyle haven in the heart of Bali’s most vibrant destination
